flawed_nl_solution:
The period the store had the TV was 2009-2001= <<2009-2001=13>>13 years.
The TV decreased by $35/year * 13 years = $<<35*13=455>>455.
So the price in 2009 was $1950 - $455 = $<<1950-455=1495>>1495.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
